titleStmt.title: Description of MS Or 66 - FOLIO/FLAT: Majmūʻah.

notesStmt.note: Accompanying material: Contains a tipped-in note between following 30v-31r, dated 1318/1900-01, with the seal of a certain ʿAlī-Rizā Khān.

msContents.summary: Anthology of classical and contemporary Persian poetry containing the work of at least three dozen poets. The frequency of the nisba Isfahānī suggests production in that city. Arranged alphabetically by rhyme syllable, the text is in two parts: the first (following 1r-66r), missing its initial folios, begins amidst poems ending in the letter "be"; the second (ff. 67v-161v), complete from "alif" to "ye", consists of ghazals.

supportDesc.extent: 161 leaves: 299 x 194 (280 x 175) mm bound to 295 x 203 mm

layoutDesc.layout: 15 lines per page in two columns with 32 marginal lines across three sides.
